title: 05/10/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/10/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, the boys are back to recap the weekend in sports. Former Olympic Sprinter Ato Boldon joined to recap DK Metcalf in the 100M. What are the chances we could see him competing in the Olympics one day? Bob Baffert, the Trainer of Medina Spirit who failed a drug test after winning the Kentucky Derby, called in to explain his side of things. And Reggie Miller discusses the battle in the Western Conference. How significant was the Lakers win over the Suns last night?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On today's Dan Patrick Show, the boys are back to recap the weekend in sports. Former Olympic Sprinter Ato Boldon joined to recap DK Metcalf in the 100M. What are the chances we could see him competing in the Olympics one day? Bob Baffert, the Trainer of Medina Spirit who failed a drug test after winning the Kentucky Derby, called in to explain his side of things. And Reggie Miller discusses the battle in the Western Conference. How significant was the Lakers win over the Suns last night?
